logentry.author: hielke.hoeve
logentry.msg: merge /branches/wicket-1.5 revs 722-1679 to trunk. make trunk wiquery 1.5.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: move slf4j-log4j12 to scope test. let users decide the logging levels.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: release 1.2.4, set all svn connections to https.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: put versions all the way up top so its easier to manage them.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: revert to old YUI compressor version, the most reliable so far... Do keep the maven plugin activated.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: copy yui compressor into our project as yui does not work as maven artifact... also let yui compress any js or css file which jquery group did not compress for us.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: local build server seems to hate me

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: slimmed version ranges down to allow older versions to be used.

logentry.author: roche.jul@gmail.com
logentry.msg:
Wiquery 1.2.1
-> release for the stylesheet bug

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: http://code.google.com/p/wiquery/issues/detail?id=132, setup junit4 and prepare wiquerytester for rendering pages with html.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: finally fix the YUI for javascript, ripped the YUI code from yahoo as this did not work for javascripts, now we only depend on rhino.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: force maven central 1 as default repo. this is way faster than the other 2 and contains most dependencies.

logentry.author: hielke.hoeve@gmail.com
logentry.msg: fix issue 115 and update dependencies to latest.

logentry.author: roche.jul
logentry.msg:
Wiquery 1.1 & 1.1 examples
-> add the following maven repository:
<repository> <id>maven.atlassian.com</id> <name>maven.atlassian.com</name> <url>https://maven.atlassian.com/3rdparty</url> </repository>

logentry.author: richardjohnwilkinson@gmail.com
logentry.msg: update pom to 1.1-SNAPSHOT for issue-97, plus this makes sense, we don't want to accidentally deploy a 1.1-alpha again

logentry.author: lionel.armanet
logentry.msg: Setting trunk branch as current development version (e.g. future release)
